name: Banana Cinnamon Ice Cream
description: Bananas make the perfect ice cream texture. Ready in minutes, you can make it at any time if you keep bananas in the freezer.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend all ingredients together until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend all ingredients together until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Place in ice cream machine immediately and follow the manufacturers instructions.
recipeInstructions.name: Place in ice cream machine immediately and follow the manufacturers instructions.

recipeInstructions.text: You can eat it right away or put it in the freezer for later.
